params._daoToken: The dao to claim rewards for.

distributeRewards(address,uint256).details: This should pull tokens from the caller's accountThis should be coded in such a way as to not require any kind of authorization other than providing an amount of reward tokens.This should handle cases where there aren't any tokens staked: first staker gets everything.

params._amount: The amount of reward token to distribute
params._daoToken: The dao to distribute rewards to

emergencyEject(address,address).details: To be used as an emergency exit hatch for users. This will permanently lock any outstanding rewards for the user in the contract.

params._daoToken: The dao governance token to eject.
params._to: The destination wallet for the ejected tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._daoToken: The governance token of the dao the user has staked
params._user: The user who staked the tokens

returns.rewardAmount: The amount of the reward token that the user is entitled to

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amount: The amount of governance token to be staked
params._daoToken: The governance token of the dao to be staked.

params._amount: The amount of governance token to be staked
params._daoToken: The governance token of the dao to be staked.
params._user: The user the tokens are being staked on behalf for

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(address,uint256,address).details: This function will also claim any outstanding rewards for the user

params._daoToken: The dao governance token to unstake
params._to: The destination for the dao tokens and rewards

PRBMathUD60x18__FromUintOverflow(uint256.notice: Emitted when converting a basic integer to the fixed-point format format overflows UD60x18.

PRBMath__MulDivFixedPointOverflow(uint25.notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

PRBMath__MulDivOverflow(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when the result overflows uint256.

claimRewards(address,address).notice: Claims all outstanding rewards for the user for the specified dao

distributeRewards(address,uint256).notice: Updates the dao distribution to include an additional amount

emergencyEject(address,address).notice: Withdraws the user's dao governance tokens without claiming any outstanding rewards

pendingRewards(address,address).notice: Returns the amount of claimable reward tokens for a user for a given dao

setLockupPeriod(uint256).notice: ### FunctionsUpdates the lock up period in state

stake(address,uint256).notice: Stakes amount of dao token into the contract

stakeOnBehalf(address,address,uint256).notice: Stakes amount of dao token into the contract for a user

unstake(address,uint256,address).notice: Unstakes and transfers out a given amount of dao governance tokens
